channel.title: Bullshit on xYs Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Bullshit on xYs Homepage

item.title: Untitled
item.description: Love you Chenchen, what will happen if it doesn’t happen. Democritus once said that abstinence increases happiness and strengthens enjoyment. With these words, we have to examine this issue more carefully: I have also considered this issue day and night after careful consideration. From this point of view, we generally believe that if we grasp the key to the problem, everything else will be solved. However, even so, the appearance of Chenchen who loves you still represents a certain meaning.
